turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, can you recommend some music? I'm in the mood for something... maybe rock?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Sure! To give you the best recommendations, can you be a little more specific? What kind of rock are you in the mood for? Classic rock, alternative rock, hard rock, etc.?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I don't know! Something... energetic? Like, stadium rock maybe? Bands like Queen or AC/DC?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I understand. Based on your preference for Queen and AC/DC (stadium rock), I'd recommend checking out Def Leppard, Guns N' Roses, and Bon Jovi. Do any of those sound appealing?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, I know Guns N' Roses, but the others...not really. What if I said I wanted something...instrumental, but still kinda rock-ish? Is that even a thing?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, absolutely! For instrumental rock, I would suggest checking out artists like Joe Satriani, Steve Vai, or bands like Explosions in the Sky (though they lean more post-rock). Would you like me to give you song recommendations for any of those?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Explosions in the Sky sounds interesting... kinda a weird name. How would you even classify their music if you had to? Is it really rock?
